about_the_game:
Avalon: Rise of the Templars is an open world MMORPG that teaches alternate history while following the secrets of Knights Templar.

Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players utilize their hero characters to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for in game currency and rare gear rewards.

The game offers complex multiplayer gameplay and an intricate economy, while also providing single players the freedom to explore and experience the game independently.

Inspired by the legend of King Arthur and an alternate history of the Knights Templar, players embark on a thrilling journey to earn their own place among the Knights of the Round Table—and perhaps even uncover the most powerful secrets hidden deep within the Templar archives.

Along the way, players earn rewards (i.e. gear, mounts or in game currency) by purchasing, renting, or securing resources as well as collaborating with landowners to acquire and build in-game real estate.

The game is being actively developed alongside 500 veteran MMORPG players and offers an equal amount of fun for those who love multiplayer raid challenges and those who prefer single-player exploration.

The gameplay options available in the current stage of development for Avalon:

  • PVE across the genesis map

  • PVP arena

  • Three types of multiplayer raids, currently limited to teams of six players

  • PVP on dragon mounts in the sky

  • First-person and third-person gameplay

  • Travel using either multiple ground mounts or the portal system

  • Harvesting, hunting, fishing, cooking, baking, and repair systems

  • Expansive world economy with mills, taverns, stables, and forges.

  • Multiple basic pets and attack pets

  • Battle Mounts

The world of Avalon will consists of twelve kingdoms, each with its own independent network of online servers.


Yes, there will be a mythical Round Table as well as twelve knights and a king--if we opt to have a monarch in the future.


In the early release, each kingdom features a grand castle with a lively town inside its walls. Surrounding it are villages, bustling towns, seven harbors, and vast seas to explore. Brave the depths of many dungeons filled with clever puzzles and daring jumps, offering endless adventures for all explorers.

Mages and healers will love our two druid classes: Earth and Water Druids. Each has a unique skill set, making them powerful allies in raids and the quest for dragon eggs.

Prepare to raise the most coveted and powerful flying mounts—Fire, Ice, and Water Dragons! Players will nurture their dragons from eggs, watch them grow into loyal pets, and ultimately unleash them as formidable battle mounts.

Players will be able to freely move between kingdoms upon reaching level twenty or simply by owning homes, service providing buildings or portals in one of the kingdoms.

The multiplayer raids are limited to six characters and will consist of following four classes:
​
Ranged - Elves, Robin of Sherwood
Tanks - The Viking Clans , The Knights of King Arthur , The Brotherhood of Templars
Healers - The Druids , Herne the Hunter
Mages - Merlin- Earth, The Grand Inquisitor- Fire , The Templar Grand Master -Ice

In the lands of Avalon, there’s something for everyone. Whether you're a lone traveler exploring vast horizons, a fearless leader in raids, a skilled weapon crafter, a keen hunter, or a fisherman and chef, Avalon welcomes you. And through it all, follow a rich questline that guides you through the alternate history of the Knights Templar. All this and more awaits every adventurer’s spirit in our world.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence

name: Avalon : Rise of the Templars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070 8 GB or faster
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3080 8 GB or faster
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

short_description: Avalon is an open-world MMORPG built in Unreal 5. Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players use their characters to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for rare gear and raid rewards. The game follows the alternate history of the Knights Templar.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
